metadata.title: CVE-2024-27402 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phonet/pep: fix racy skb_queue_empty() useThe receive queues are protected by their respective spin-lock, notthe socket lock. This could lead to skb_peek() unexpectedlyreturning NULL or a pointer to an already dequeued socket buffer.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
